2:T754,{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Recipe","name":"Fernet con Coca","description":"Argentina's unofficial national cocktail — bitter Fernet Branca mixed with Coca-Cola, served in a large glass and often shared among friends. An acquired taste that becomes an obsession.","image":"https://expatsargentina.com/images/recipes/fernet-con-coca.webp","author":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Expats Argentina"},"datePublished":"2025-01-01","prepTime":"PT2M","cookTime":"PT0M","totalTime":"PT2M","recipeYield":"1 servings","recipeCategory":"appetizer","recipeCuisine":"Argentine","keywords":"fernet con coca recipe, argentine cocktail, fernet branca coca cola, fernet argentina, cordoba drink","nutrition":{"@type":"NutritionInformation","calories":"210 calories","proteinContent":"0g","carbohydrateContent":"28g","fatContent":"0g"},"recipeIngredient":["60ml (2 oz) Fernet Branca","200ml (7 oz) Coca-Cola (must be very cold, preferably from a glass bottle)","Ice cubes","Tall glass (a large cup or tumbler — traditionally shared)"],"recipeInstructions":[{"@type":"HowToStep","position":1,"text":"Fill a tall glass about one-third full with ice cubes."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":2,"text":"Pour the Fernet Branca over the ice. The traditional ratio is about 30% Fernet to 70% Coca-Cola, but this varies by preference."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":3,"text":"Slowly pour the cold Coca-Cola down the side of the glass to preserve carbonation. Don't dump it in — you'll lose the fizz."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":4,"text":"Stir gently once or twice with a spoon or straw. Don't over-stir."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":5,"text":"Serve immediately. In a social setting, pass the glass around — it's a communal drink."},{"@type":"HowToStep","position":6,"text":"Take your first sip. If you're new to Fernet, start with less Fernet and more Coca-Cola."}]}0:{"buildId":"XJ7f5RvYDcX4yjbAXmNYG","rsc":["$","$1","c",{"children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-b from-orange-50 to-white","children":[["$","script",null,{"type":"application/ld+json","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$2"}}],["$","div",null,{"className":"border-b bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm sticky top-0 z-40 print:hidden","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 py-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center justify-between","children":["$","$L3",null,{"href":"/food/recipes","children":[["$","svg",null,{"xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide lucide-arrow-left w-4 h-4","aria-hidden":"true","children":[["$","path","1l729n",{"d":"m12 19-7-7 7-7"}],["$","path","x3x0zl",{"d":"M19 12H5"}],"$undefined"]}],"All Recipes"],"data-slot":"button","data-variant":"ghost","data-size":"sm","className":"inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4 shrink-0 [&_svg]:shrink-0 outline-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:hover:bg-accent/50 h-8 rounded-md px-3 has-[>svg]:px-2.5 gap-2","ref":null}]}]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"relative bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-600 via-red-600 to-orange-700 text-white print:bg-none print:text-black","children":["$L4","$L5"]}],"$L6","$L7"]}],null,"$L8"]}],"loading":null,"isPartial":false}

Don't over-stir."}]]}],["$","li","4",{"className":"flex gap-4","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex-shrink-0 w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-orange-100 text-orange-600 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm","children":5}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700 leading-relaxed pt-1","children":"Serve immediately. In a social setting, pass the glass around — it's a communal drink."}]]}],["$","li","5",{"className":"flex gap-4","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex-shrink-0 w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-orange-100 text-orange-600 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm","children":6}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700 leading-relaxed pt-1","children":"Take your first sip. If you're new to Fernet, start with less Fernet and more Coca-Cola."}]]}]]}]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm bg-gradient-to-br from-amber-50 to-orange-50 border-amber-100 print:bg-none print:border-gray-300","id":"tips","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6","children":"$L14"}],"$L15"]}],"$L16","$L17"]}]

15:["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"space-y-3","children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-amber-500 mt-1","children":"✦"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700","children":"The Coca-Cola MUST be ice cold and freshly opened — warm or flat Coca-Cola ruins the drink. 16:["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm print:shadow-none print:border-gray-300","id":"history","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-title","className":"font-semibold flex items-center gap-2 text-xl","children":[["$","svg",null,{"xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide lucide-history w-5 h-5 text-orange-600","aria-hidden":"true","children":[["$","path","1357e3",{"d":"M3 12a9 9 0 1 0 9-9 9.75 9.75 0 0 0-6.74 2.74L3 8"}],["$","path","1xhq8a",{"d":"M3 3v5h5"}],["$","path","1fdv2h",{"d":"M12 7v5l4 2"}],"$undefined"]}],"The Story Behind the Dish"]}]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700 leading-relaxed","children":"Fernet Branca is an Italian herbal bitter, but Argentina consumes more of it than Italy and the rest of the world combined. The tradition of mixing it with Coca-Cola started in Córdoba in the 1980s and spread nationwide. Today, Argentina consumes over 25 million liters of Fernet annually. In Córdoba, it's served in large shared glasses at parties (previas), and the person who mixes it holds a position of social responsibility — the ratio must be perfect."}]}]]}]
17:["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm print:shadow-none print:border-gray-300","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6 pb-3","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-title","className":"font-semibold text-lg","children":"Storage & Leftovers"}]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-0","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700","children":"Must be consumed immediately. Fernet Branca keeps indefinitely in the bottle."}]}]]}]
